title: Construction Engineering Sensor Data Analysis: Practical Problem-Solving Using Block-Based Programming

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic construction engineering knowledge, no programming experience
context.additional_context: Using block-based tools for analyzing construction site sensor data and completing projects to solve real-world construction issues (e.g., musculoskeletal risks)

learning_goals: Learners can visualize and interpret construction sensor data using block-based programming tools
Learners can propose improvement plans for real-world construction site issues (e.g., worker safety) based on analysis results
Learners can collaboratively complete data analysis projects in team-based PBL environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
